sentences.english: Cindy and I met in class and really hit it off.
sentences.chinese: 我是在課堂上認識辛迪的，還真是情投意合。

sentences.english: Do not lose the chance when you know who is suited to you temperamentally.
sentences.chinese: 請你不要輕易錯過與你情投意合的人。

sentences.english: Anne and Mark really hit it off at the party last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨天的晚會上，安妮和馬克情投意合。

sentences.english: So do not lose the chance when you know who is suited to you temperamentally.
sentences.chinese: 因此，請你不要輕易錯過與你情投意合的人。
